website_summaries.verdict: The MEElectronics Air-Fi AF32 Bluetooth headphones are very solid for the money.
pros: The  MEElectronics Air-Fi AF32  on-ear stereo Bluetooth headphones are comfortable and relatively affordable, offering good sound quality for Bluetooth standards
They have a built-in microphone for making calls, are rated for 12 hours of battery life on a single charge, and can also be used as corded headphones (cable included)
cons: They don't fold flat, and the on-ear design makes your ears steamy in warm weather

customer_reviews.title: Songs Stuck in Your Head
customer_reviews.text: This brand is one of the best bargains going. I have a wired set I absolutely love and figured I'd try the brand for wireless. Love these, too. They sound great only if you get them sealed to your ear correctly. If that's possible with the tips they provide, great. If not, give the Comply tips a shot. They worked wonderfully for me. The other issue I have is that they'll lose connection right when I turn them on, but it does reconnect shortly after. Other than that I would say if you're looking for a good pair of Bluetooth earphones, you have found them.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B.

customer_reviews.title: I love the design
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I love the design. These feel very durable and fit well inside your ears. They charge quickly and last me about 6-7h. The sound is good, but nothing amazing for earphones at this range. I'm. Also a big fan of the sweat resistance. Cons: the cord is pretty small, you can leave them around your neck and they can easily fall off if you're not careful. The Bluetooth disconnects at times, annoying but not a deal breaker
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo gomez

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased MEE Audio Headphones in the past. They last just past the warranty period (1 year) and die. And By the way if you are 13 months after your purchase -- don't bother contacting customer service for a warranty repair. That said, they are relatively inexpensive, sound ok for the price, so I purchased another pair. Again the sound was ok for the price, but the battery life was VERY poor. Advertised 8 hours with just music and at best last 2 hours. I returned them. There is a huge difference in sound quality and battery life for headphones <$100 and those $>100. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these specifically because they promised to stay put for runners. They do, and then some. They come with different ear piece sizes, so I was able to select the right size to fit each ear (my ear canals aren't identical ). This helps reduce outside noise substantially. And without all that extraneous noise, you can really hear some quality music. And I have yet to run the battery down - I wind up charging them just because it's part of my routine.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Porter

customer_reviews.title: Goood but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Overall, they work well but there are a few flaws. They don’t always connect to my iPhone 6s and at times I need to go into Bluetooth settings and re set. The odd thing is it show in settings as connected but audio doesn’t play through them. I simply click on them again in settings and they connect. Secondly, the microphone works but is not very clear. Some people on calls complain of an echo. Other then those complaints it’s a good unit that sounds good and has good battery life. I enjoy seeing the battery status in the upper right corner of my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie G

customer_reviews.title: Have now snapped two of them.  Lousy, cheap, fragile construction.
customer_reviews.text: Well, twice bitten now. These headphones have decent sound but are constructed of fragile plastic which has now snapped on me twice. The rubber/plastic earpads also degrade quickly, fragmenting into pieces. Do not recommend these. I don't know if headphones are buy once, cry once sort of affairs, but these are not worth the money. It's too bad; I had no objections to the sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Willoughby

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic with Bluetooth equipped gear.
customer_reviews.text: Just found time to pair it up to my Windows 10 HP Notebook. Went to settings, Bluetooth, More Bluetooth options, then checked to look for Bluetooth devices. Followed instructions included for pairing. All went well. Sounds terrific. Walked away probably 30+ feet and never lost quality. Will not work with TV unless it has Bluetooth or you buy a Bluetooth transmitter because the included cord is only 4' long and you can't use any other cord. So be forewarned. They are working on headset that you can use any cord. Best of all, this headphone really helps my hearing problem. I can really understand people even without the closed captions.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory R. Whitlow

customer_reviews.title: The only ones that fit
customer_reviews.text: Great sound! MEE audio are the only headphones I can wear - I'm super active and have small ears that don't accept most ear buds. Sometimes I hear an odd 'clicking' noise while walking/running, and I wish there was a way to turn these on that doesn't require a button press for 5 seconds. But on the whole I'm pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: These are the most reliable and well made headphones I've had but....
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are sturdy and we'll made. The sound isnt the best I've heard but it is not the worst either. The biggest problem I have with these is the ear buds. I workout every morning and have used these for months. As soon as I perspire, they slip out of my ears and will not securely stay in until I dry my ears and the ear buds. It's a great inconvenience while your workingout.
customer_reviews.author: NYB

customer_reviews.title: Both ears for phone.  Superb sound quality, especially for the price.  Rechargeable batteries last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Deep base and great sound quality at a very affordable price. I bought a second pair of these to use at work. I use these for phone conversations because the phone sound comes into both ears, making it easier to hear the often poor quality of the cell phone systems. Stays charged a very long time. Not sure how long but often go for days without plugging back into charger and it never seems to run down. They have a strange way of folding up that I think some reviewers have mistaken for them being broken. I've had my first set for 2&1/2 years with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: nospam77

customer_reviews.title: Way too big for small ears
customer_reviews.text: I have been desperately trying to find headphones small enough for my ears. The small tips did barely fit in my ear canals, but the wireless "hooks" were too huge. Without anything to anchor them, I could not get them to stay in my ears when I started running. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: heyrey

customer_reviews.title: and they felt comfortable and did not fall out of my ear at ...
customer_reviews.text: I used them while on the treadmill doing a 3-mile run at about a pace of 6, and they felt comfortable and did not fall out of my ear at any point. As I moved to the weight area, I found myself wanting to skip songs, and change the volume, and was able to do both with no problem. My favorite feature is the ability to pause the song when I needed to talk to my workout partner, and I was able to do that a simple click of the button.
customer_reviews.author: tedtruson

customer_reviews.title: In a year battery is 10-15 minutes :(
customer_reviews.text: Update: after less than a year they don't hold charge any more :( Appears it's pretty standard for earbuds though? Very nice headphones , excellent audio quality. Battery lives for quite a few hours, can't exactly say how much I charge them once a week with a minimum of 40 minutes and maximum of 2 hours of usage every day.
customer_reviews.author: SY

customer_reviews.title: Very good product great value.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm very pleased with these headphones. They last 2-3 days on a single charge, fold down to half their size and have a nice cloth bag with all accessories. I have had a few issues with Bluetooth connectivity but I think that was due more to Windows 10 updates than the headphones. If I uninstalled and then re-paired they worked just fine. The sound quality isn't as good as a pair of cheap Sennheisers for music but it's fine for watching TV YouTube etc. You can't really beat them for value.
customer_reviews.author: honest bloke

customer_reviews.title: Dependable Headphones for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these wireless headphones almost 18 months ago, and they're still working great. I use them almost every time I go to the gym or on a walk (so probably about an hour at a time, 5+ days a week). While the sound quality isn't magnificent, they definitely meet my needs. Each charge lasts a considerable time, and I love that they're wireless. Aesthetically, they are slightly bulky and don't fit super closely around your head. I personally like that they're noticeable, though, since I find it keeps people from trying to talk to me at the gym. Overall, good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lizjoyiforous

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!  Great Range!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect with one hitch - it constantly tells me "call disconnected" when I'm using it on my PC and I hit anything that beeps, burps or alarms. That part is annoying Its actually still connected to the PC and the sound still works just fine. It's just that annoying "call disconnected" when the single gong in windows sounds for any reason. What I like about this most is the ability to walk around in the kitchen for a glass of Tea, some 45 feet from the transmitter, and I can still hear the TV/PC just as clearly as if I was still sitting in front of it! Great for those of us old-farts!
customer_reviews.author: D. Francis

customer_reviews.title: Love These, BUT....
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice sounding and comfortable Bluetooth headphones. Definitely worth the money. The "BUT"? Connectivity. The problem usually arises after making the first pairing/connection--which almost always is easy, no matter the machine or device--and an example today was the EIGHT attempts I had to make to reconnect it to my desktop. It's not the machine--a loaded Dell XPS 27" AIO Touch--it's the headphones. They've never reconnected easily on any phone, tablet, MP3 player, laptop, or TV I've used them with. Many times I've questioned myself, thinking I was doing something wrong. Doubt it. I have no trouble with an LG pair. These would be an easy 5 star product if not for this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Spafford

customer_reviews.title: disappointed....
customer_reviews.text: i have had these sitting on the shelf for over a year. upon arrival, i was unable to connect them with any of my bluetooth devices. and once again, i thought i would try to connect them with my bose speaker; still, no luck. it is unfortunate because i'd like my money back or at least get another set and see if they are not defective. FYI, the charging and sound from the headphones are operating fine.
customer_reviews.author: QMOAK

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but they have issues
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the ear covering faux leather on these headphones. They have better than average sound. The bass is pronounced without overpowering treble. I use these headphones daily for at least four hours a day. My only issues so far with these headphones are the following: You cannot use the bluetooth headphones while they are charging. The headband tends to yank out hairs if your hair is longer. The hinge has already loosened to the point it barely stays unfolded anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Stewhi

customer_reviews.title: Day 2 I noticed a very irritating noise like a small electric motor running in right ear headphone
customer_reviews.text: Day one, it took 3 attempts and over 15 minutes to recognize my Vizio. Even now when I turn them on, it takes 20 to 25 seconds to receive sound. Day 2 I noticed a very irritating noise like a small electric motor running in right ear headphone. Day 3 until I decided to return them, periodically stops receiving signal and I had to turn them off and back on. Day 6 I started having trouble getting them to recharge. Intermittent charging light. Day 7 & 8 I've had it. Battery is dead, and will not recharge. Returned for refund!
customer_reviews.author: Edgar K. Southward

customer_reviews.title: Won't charge after few uses.
customer_reviews.text: The headphone works well for few weeks. The top part is quite tight, so you would feel some pressure on top of your head if you wear it more than 30min. It stops working when I tried to re-charge it for the 3rd time. The red light is on for a while, then it stops. When you press it, the red-blue light start to blink. I tried all kinds of inlet, on computer, several different USB outlet. The headphone just can't be recharged.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Field

customer_reviews.title: Average bluetooth headphones.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones do not sound as good as some of the reviewers on Amazon or online say. They produce a lot of hiss at high notes. It seems like they really struggle at producing clear and quality music. These don't feel well-built, very plasticky when pressing the buttons. They do look good from the outside though. The ear pads don't swivel so it's a little tricky to get a good fit on your ears. I tried using these making a couple of calls. People from the other line had trouble hearing me.
customer_reviews.author: Long Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Better than I had first thought
customer_reviews.text: I initially gave these a low rating for muddy base. I'm using them with a win8.1 laptop and discovered the default settings for these headphones included an 8db base boost. Disabling that setting cleared-up the muddy base straight away. * Can't use them when charging. * What's with the blinking blue light? You won't notice it, but others surely will. Seriously. If you wear these out-and-about, shopping, walking, riding the train, etc., people will be looking at you and snickering. At home, people in the same room with you are eventually gonna get annoyed and ask you to put away your new toy or find a bit of black tape for that ridiculous blinking light.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: and really happy with my choice
customer_reviews.text: My first bluetooth headphones, and really happy with my choice. I picked these based on the great reviews of previous models of MEE Audio, and I was very attracted to the swiveling tips. I think they do help with comfort and sound, by getting a customized alignment in your ear. Speaking of sound, I think it's quite good. I wish the highs were a little brighter, and the lows were a little lower, but at this price, it's nothing to complain about. Especially for something I'm using while running. I've had no issues with dropped connections, and battery life seems great, like 8-10 hours or so.
customer_reviews.author: J. Photos

customer_reviews.title: Good wireless headsets
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Good sound quality. Right price. The microphone is a little weak. People can't hear me talking unless I pull the bud out of my ear and allow it to hang down, thereby putting the microphone closer to my mouth. When I do that, they can hear me just fine. After my conversation is complete, I put the bud back in my ear and carry on. For the price and the good sound music quality, I can deal with this.
customer_reviews.author: cary w.

customer_reviews.title: An Honest and critical Rating
customer_reviews.text: Never had wireless headphones before....so that just rocks first and formost...I feel like I am ahead of the curve at the gym being the only one free of cords. They are very light, also fragile feeling, but are surprising comfortable and fit very well while running on a treadmill. Taking calls....is awesome... It is a different experience talking remotely to someone when all your wearing are these ear muffs. It makes it a lot more natural and comfortable. Now lastly Sound Quality.....Eh...I think I could say I've heard better from a 60+ pair of headphones over the years...but it does sound quite nice...that combined with the aforementioned details...makes this a happy purchase...and me a happy consumer :)
customer_reviews.author: Jared M

customer_reviews.title: Not for small ears
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was great but if you have small ears stay away! There are different sized covers, however even the smallest was too big for my ear canal. They are also designed to fit snugly in your outside ear and this part was also too big. Headphones were constantly falling out and ears were sore after using. I have never thought of myself as having tiny ears - maybe on the smaller size, but my thought is for many women these will not fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis White

customer_reviews.title: Good, but has design flaws
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good, they also have a lower and smoother profile compared to other bluetooth inears ive owned, fit in th ear canal i pretty good too. I have a few issues though, I hate the "tail" that is created using the cord management clip, that must be redesigned. The cord that wraps around the top of the ear is way to flimsy which makes it annoying put on and adjust.
customer_reviews.author: S. Foss

customer_reviews.title: These sounds amazing. I have been in the audio industry for ...
customer_reviews.text: These sounds amazing. I have been in the audio industry for over 30 years and for the price... I love them. As in other reviews... the plastic is a bit thin but they are sturdy enough. They are super comfortable as well. I would recommend them to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Second Pair
customer_reviews.text: I realized I needed to buy a second pair of these because I was always wanted to still use them when they were charging on my computer. So I just got a second pair so one is always charged. My first pair were the black and red, and then I got these so I didn't get them mixed up in case I needed to send one back. But there were no problems. I actually think it's worth having two, considering that I use them so frequently, and taking into account how expensive the competitors' are. Update: March now, and they're still going strong, and so is my first pair.
customer_reviews.author: Molly McGee

customer_reviews.title: Great blue tooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: I've had these a couple of months now and use them at least once a month. Sound quality is excellent and the battery life is amazing. I got them and fully charged them out of the box and haven't had to recharge yet (I use them about once a week). The only small thing I would have a gripe about is when they are on they have a blinking blue light which is distracting at night when I'm watching Netflix. However that's nothing a little piece of black tape can't fix. Overall I think they're an excellent buy especially given how affordable they are.
customer_reviews.author: csa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones with crisp sound
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item approximately 6 months ago and I could not be more pleased. The audio is crisp and clear and the bass is deep without being overpowering. The earphones become searchable as a bluetooth device by holding down on the power button for approximately 5 seconds. The charge on these headphones seems like it lasts forever. I do not use them every day, so I find that I only need to charge them every 2-3 weeks. I use these headphones with my Samsung phone, Samsung tablet, and Acer laptop, and have had no issues connecting the bluetooth. I would absolutely buy these headphones again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound and battery life!
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound and battery life! However, NONE of the three sizes of earbuds that came with the headset fit well. I wound up settling with a pair of earbuds from my Phaiser 730 headset. Also, when I chew, my jawbone loosens the headset and all of the bass disappears. Those are the reasons for only 3 stars instead of 4.
customer_reviews.author: Grill Sergeant

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to pair it with my Kindle. It pairs up nicely to the Kindle but I've found it doesn't always pick the kindle back up when you return back to it. So there is the inconvenience of going back into the bluetooth menu and connecting them back again. But I don't know if this is a Kindle issue or the headphones issue. Good sound and easy to wear since most of the weight is carry by the over the head strap. Does block out other sounds to some extent. So far the charge hasn't gone out on me. I'm thinking of buying another set for home as the current set stays at work.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper1937

customer_reviews.title: The Last Headphones You'll Ever Have To Buy!
customer_reviews.text: There are not enough good words to use to describe these headphones! The design, construction, operation, and sound quality far exceeded anything I was expecting, especially for the price! Rich bass, super clarity, ease of operation, quick and simple pairing, and the list goes on! The comfort with wearing them, even with glasses is nothing short of amazing. Telephone call quality is unbelievable. Android and Windows operation flawless. I have a Roku 3 with the remote than can use headphones - you can screw the $1000 TV surround system. Put these on and you are in the movie! The 3.5mm jack is definitely a great touch. Nothing bad about these headphones. I only wish I got them in Red.
customer_reviews.author: Radashack

customer_reviews.title: buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty disappointed but maybe I just got a lemon! Took way longer than 4 hours to charge. Doesn't hold a charge. Charges through 3.5mm head so have to carry the cable instead of a universal usb mini/micro. bluetooth connection is spotty, and slight tinnny noise in background. also not comfortable my ears get warm very quickly and it does bleed sound. i'm disappointed! i wish i spent a little more and bought the jabra bluetooth headphones I originally intended to, here's to trying to save money.
customer_reviews.author: Dismas Yang

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: Just got these yesterday from Amazon Warehouse Deals, Paid under $20 and they work like a charm. Took awhile to get them set up as there were NO instructions included, but after a quick trip to google, connected and all is well, comfortable and easy access buttons. But the best thing is...... The announcement accent is actually ... wait for it...........American. I was stunned at that, worth buying for that alone. Have a Great Day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent pair of earbuds
customer_reviews.text: My biggest complaint is the size of the ear bud. I like a streamline fit so when i have a beanie on or my headband for riding my ear isnt pressured. The other style mee ear buds were probably as good as it gets for the size. The buttons felt good and useable by feel. Sound quality was decent. Indidnt notice as many "interruptions" in the sound stream as with the other mee headphones. They seemed like good headphones but i dont like them because of the earbud size
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bija

customer_reviews.title: Super but not for Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, size, comfort, and price. These pair easily and won’t fall out of your ears. Love them for my phone and iPad, but I could not get Windows 10 to recognize for my PC
customer_reviews.author: CL3

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, some sound drops and crackling in bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Sharp, clear sound with great balance so that you get the main sound in the center of your head with the stereo voices appearing right and left only when the artist wants them there. Mostly comfortable, but just a tad tight. Was very easy to pair with my blue tooth, but finicky with a Windows 8.1 bluetooth pairing. Several drops and static, even with a slight turn of the head. So I am rating it 5 for ease of use, 4 for comfort, and 3 for stability
customer_reviews.author: Tom, the Squirrel Whisper

customer_reviews.title: These sound great, connect easily to my ipod
customer_reviews.text: These sound great, connect easily to my ipod, and are comfortable to wear for extended periods of time. Battery life has yet to disappoint, having them on continuously throughout my 8 hour work day. In the building where I use them the most, the range of the connection seems inadequate if I leave my device in one place and walk to another more than say 20 feet away. I attribute this to the size of the building and the open area. Under normal conditions they are flawless. If you keep your device in your pocket you'll never have any connection troubles. Highly recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Intolerant

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: The first pair came and was a DUD! Wouldn't pair with any of my devices, and other issues. The vendor was excellent in sending out a new pair right away while I sent them back at no cost to me. The new pair came and they are excellent! They are very soft on the ears, pair quickly, and if using with cord, they shut down to save the battery! I love how they fold up for transport and the little bag to keep them in. I'm so glad I gave them a chance to replace them instead of taking a refund! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Mom58

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly pleased!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I give these a 5-star because of its ease of operation/pairing, and also because of the audio clarity. I was a bit concerned about being heard on the other end of line, but folks reassure me that my voice is coming in very clear. Using it for my cell phone is much, much better than the ear "thingie" - and less likely to be misplaced because of its size. Music also comes in very clear. I will most likely get another pair for use on our boat.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Gallant

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I'm just used to cheaper Bluetooth headphones, but these blew me away. Very clear, excellent bass response, and noise isolation. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Cocchiola

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Office
customer_reviews.text: Great for the office. I use these for phone calls and they work perfect. They stay charged for a long time and charge up fast.I love that the Runaway's are light on my head and comfortable on my ears. Music sounds good, but I am a total elitist snob when it comes to audio. If you want good audio headphones, save your money and go by some Bose QC25/35 or comparable product. I would buy the Runaway's again, next time in red.
customer_reviews.author: Althaezel the Mage

customer_reviews.title: A little dissappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I've read reviews saying these headphones sound good. However, even when using the stereo cable these sound flat. Still good for the price. Took 3 house to charge up out of the box. But have been working (two days) just fine ever since. No problem pairing them to my old iMac.
customer_reviews.author: OpenSprit

customer_reviews.title: Above Average Bluetooth headphones for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best bluetooth headphones I have bought. They connect easily to my Galaxy Note 8, Galaxy Note One smartphone,Ipad Retina and Ipad Air, and my HP desktop. They have a good amount of bass..not overwhelming but good, and the overall sound is pleasing to me even at a somewhat higher volume. They are well constructed & collapsable. The only reason I did not give them a 5 star rating was because they can start to become uncomfortable to wear after and hour or so. However, they are my go to headphones if I want to listen to a bluetooth device where the sound is low.
customer_reviews.author: GHG

customer_reviews.title: Good when I can get it to connect correctly
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good and so is the build quality. But I've had problems with getting this headphone to connect with my laptop. And when it does connect, there is occasionally a problem that causes the sound quality to be very poor. When that happens, I disconnect and reconnect and the problem usually goes away. But I've not had this many problems using with my other Bluetooth headphones. I've updated the Bluetooth drivers on my laptop, but it failed to fix the problem. Otherwise I've been pleased with these headphones. I'm subtracting one star for the annoyance factor of occasional connection problems.
customer_reviews.author: J. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Good sound - Terrible Battery
customer_reviews.text: These were my first wireless headphones. They worked great at first - paired easily, worked great, battery life wonderful. However, in less than 2 months, the battery life has gone significantly down. It advertises as 7.5 hours, but i am lucky to get 2.5 hours on a full charge now. I will likely be purchasing a different set, as I bought these specifically to listen through my work day, and I now can only use them for about half of my work day, if that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for music/sound/etc/ and pretty good for calls
customer_reviews.text: I use this mainly for sitting on conference calls. Decided to spend a bit more and get something that I could also listen to music/books etc.. Calls sound perfect, however when speaking I have to speak up a bit so the other party can hear clearly. Its well worth the trade off for listening to my phone. It also pairs immediately with my phone when I turn it on. I've had/have other devices where I must go in and manually connect. It connects lightning fast. So far battery life has been fantastic. I received 4 days ago, and have only charged it once. So far have used it for daily 1 hour conference calls.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch and Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I've owned so many headphones looking for the right fit for me,,Bought mine two weeks ago, was very skeptical due to reviews I read stating average sound and problems with bluetooth connections...well the sound quality seems to improve daily (no kidding) and I"ve had no problems with the bluetooth connection, neither while running outside or walking all over the house ( I leave my android in one place, totally stationary, and I get good sound quality anywhere in the house), and I can hear when people talk to me..I'm keeping my headphones ..
customer_reviews.author: W P N

customer_reviews.title: AF32 BT Headset
customer_reviews.text: This headset has performed perfectly. I have been using them at work for more than a year, paired with an apple ipod nano. They are used on average 3 days a week. The only problem has been the blue led. It will stop blinking when the battery has lost a tiny bit of its charge. A charge still lasts twice as long as the nano. I was worried about the hinges, because they get folded after every use, and carried in a backpack,but are holding up well. The earcups do allow your ears to get "sweaty". Sound quality is very good. Even better when using the enclosed cable between the nano, and headset.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Stone

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfactory Device - For My Use
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the customer service for this device is excellent. I thought there was a problem with the quality of reception and transmission. I called the company and they promptly sent me a replacement device. Having said that, I am not satisfied with the product due to a substantial degradation in the sound quality using both the Bluetooth and wired connections. I cannot use this device and decided to go ahead and buy the Bass Effects and Beats Studio devices at a higher price for a better sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: SardoolS1

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, Easy, Functional, Comfortable...
customer_reviews.text: I needed wireless headsets to listen to audio books and music while I get ready for work in the morning and for when I'm cleaning the house, etc. Didn't really need extremely high quality (and very expensive) sets but bought two other low cost ($40-ish) that didn't even work at all and had to be returned. These worked immediately (after the initial charge)....I actually like the fit better than my partners $200 set of high quality noise reduction ones -- those hurt my ears and head after a few minutes. These are very comfortable...and very very easy to set up. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana Higashi

customer_reviews.title: What a great wired/wireless headphone!
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost everyday on campus, in the train, shopping, almost anywhere I go. Very comfortable for me, I can wear them for hours without hurting my ears. Just the right amount of bass/treble. I pair this headphone with my Bluetooth capable Philips GoGear Ariaz. Amazing battery capacity, which last around 12-15 hours on Bluetooth. When it runs out of juice, plugin the tangle-free 3.5mm headphone cord and you're back in business. Couple of things that would've made this perfect for me was I wish it had a 'micro-usb' charging port (it uses the 3.5mm jack for charging) and the LED blink rate was once every 10 seconds instead of every 2 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: coolnezz

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Received the Headset right on time. After I charged them the required amount of time, I turned them on, read the instructions, and pairing was easy. I did have a bit of trouble with my Macbook pro. It kept giving me an error. That was an apple problem and not the headset. All my devices recognized the headset right away. The controls are right on the headset and easy to work. They are comfortable to wear, though I have only had them for a few hours. They sound great for the price. I use them mostly for my Macbook Pro. I can listen and talk with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Graig Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: MacBook Pro a no-go
customer_reviews.text: The bluetooth function does not work with my MacBook Pro, nor with my partner's. We bought 2 pairs and neither pair works with either computer. We are able to get one working sometimes after going through a lot of putzing with system preferences, deleting and reinstalling the Bluetooth pairing, etc., but nothing that lasts and nothing that is repeatable. I give this 2 stars instead of 1 because the tech support fellow really did try to help, but to no avail. We live in Mexico, shipping was astronomical and we can't return them, or we would.
customer_reviews.author: Casa Semanas

customer_reviews.title: Sure the sound quality on those are much better, but the convenience of juts throwing these on ...
customer_reviews.text: My go-to headphones. I have another power of very hi-quality headphone which plug in with my headphone amp to my computer or phone, but I rarely use it. Sure the sound quality on those are much better, but the convenience of juts throwing these on my head and having no wires is very underrated. Plus the sound quality on these are very good. Also they work well at far distances. I can easily walk 100 feet away and suffer no loss in signal or fidelity. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: arjzv

customer_reviews.title: My daughter instantly disliked them for the way they fit
customer_reviews.text: I have had these three months. My daughter instantly disliked them for the way they fit. They sit on your ears like pillows. The sound would intermittently cut out. We were going to return them right away but she decided to give them a chance. I wish we hadn't. Not even three months later, the grey faux-leather covering the ears is worn out and ripped as if the thing was 2 years old. I did not get my money's worth, even if they were inexpensive. I regret to say, but I would discourage others from buying these.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HEADPHONES
customer_reviews.text: Have worn for extended listening sessions, very comfortable. Connects with ease with my wireless devices. Sound is smooth, full bodied with great bass definition without sounding boomy, clear midrange and excellent treble clarity. . Truly benefits from high quality downloads or recordings, am able to crank up the volume without cone breakup or distortion as I have experienced with other bluetooth headphones.... a coworker listened to my MEElenctronics Air fi AF32's and refused to take them off, had to make her order her own set lol...for the money a great buy...Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: tacoz1

customer_reviews.title: Now I'm a Dancin' Fool
customer_reviews.text: I need music while I do housework, period. My husband works at home, & his office is in an open space, so I can't blare my music the way I'd like. Well... since I got these bluetooth headphones, my music goes where I go & doesn't disturb him. I am pleasantly surprised by how far I can go from my source (usually my phone) & by the sound quality. I also like that I can answer my phone while listening. These MEElectronics Air Fi headphones rock! My only issue is when I start dancing around, they can get a little hot... small price to pay for the freedom to jam all over my house!
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Blues

customer_reviews.title: Two years on, and works like day one.
customer_reviews.text: "You purchased this item on September 18, 2012." I have owned these headphones going on two years!!! I can definitely say thats the longest a pair of headphones have lasted me!!! And to think, this had bluetooth, a rechargeable battery(things that can easily go bad) and two years later everything works perfectly! Easy to pair with computer and phone and the audio(for bluetooth) is excellent. I was actually comparing these against the beats a couple years ago and had a couple friends go with the beats. Guess what headphones they own now??? I liked this product so much I just bought their over the ear headphones and I am sure I will be just as pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Boyack

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff for the listener on the go.
customer_reviews.text: Good headphone that work well. They sound as good as any Bluetooth headphone I've used. They hold on to my head really well and don't get in the way. Battery life has been excellent.
customer_reviews.author: GremlinMT

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Bluetooth!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I bought these headphones, but let me tell you, I couldn't be more happy about purchasing them! I doubt you'll find anything that sounds as good as these do for the money. I have a pair of Bose QC3 On-Ear Noise Cancelling headphones, and they are great, but they also cost $300! If you want a pair of headphones that you don't have to wear white gloves with, and just want to wear around mowing the lawn, or working in the garage, these are the ones for you!! For a set that is not "noise cancelling", they have great full rich sound that everyone will enjoy! Even the bass heads out there!
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase--Use in gym
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Bluetooth headphones. Had held off purchasing after reading reviews on other similar headphone types reading comments such as "Bluetooth headphone technology is just not there yet..." However, I could not be happier with this set. I use them in the gym both for both lifting and running. Headphones are both clear and loud enough to cancel outside noises and put you in the zone. Once you put these on might be a good idea to warn others around you, they will start receiving mean-mugs while you are pumping copious amounts of weights and your muscles are running white-hot.
customer_reviews.author: David Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great Wireless Headset
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine showed up to work with these one day and after giving it a quick test drive I was very impressed, especially based off of the price. The music quality is very decent and the telephone mic works well. My only minor complaints are as follows; The headset material (in black) appears to show oil and other types of liquid based marks very easily. The headset changing must be done via a USB connection to a PC. You can not use a USB-to-AC adapter. Overall I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CoquiLostInNY

customer_reviews.title: Best bluetooth headphones for the money, hands down!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed by the sound quality of these headphones, so much so that I bought an extra pair for work! Pairing them is super-easy, and the sound output is really amazing for the price. I recently left my $200 Beats by Dre Solos on an airplane and bought these as a temporary replacement, but I don't see a need to go back. They don't cancel noise quite as well, but the sound quality is otherwise on-par (not quite as bass-heavy) and the addition of bluetooth connectivity makes this purchase a no-brainer!
customer_reviews.author: momentarydogma

customer_reviews.title: awesome headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife for Christmas, she listens to books on her I pad. She loves them. She wears them for many hours a day without ear fatique and the battery lasts a very long time, over 15 he's of listening so far without charging. When she turns them on the phones tell her the battery condition. She can walk anywhere in the house and still has connectivity. I made some points with her with this gift, great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Merle

customer_reviews.title: So far, my second favorite purchase this year
customer_reviews.text: These sound awesome, charge easily, pair very easily with ALL my devices (3 different computers , my phone, and car), and they are very comfortable. This is one of the few products that dont have any drawbacks. I have bought headphones from MEElectronics in the past, and I have not been let down yet. One thing that this set had that I really wasnt aware of , but was pleasantly surprised by, was the built in microphone. It is really awesome for using with my phone. Bonus !!
customer_reviews.author: GoldenElkLad

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I have been looking for a bluetooth headset for some time now. I am so happy with this purchase. The sound is super clear and the bass is not distorted or muffled. I'm not a huge bass guy, but I love a good clear bass line and this product delivers. On high volume, the apple ear buds are usually distorted. This sound quality is amazing with no distortion. Highly recommend especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SurfingandMusic

customer_reviews.title: Very good Headphones
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is really good. The sound quality is really good. Connect my mobile iphone 5 was easy and quick, I recommend following the instructions to make it so. I also connect to an ipod touch and a samsung omnia and the connection was good. You choose the music track is played back immediately. The speaker has cable to connect a device that has no wireless connection. The product was very well packed. Con: The Headphones has volume limit, I could not turn the volume up to a very high. That's good if you care of the ears.
customer_reviews.author: DONY

customer_reviews.title: Good product not good support.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Runaway (AF32-GK) Bluetooth headphones by MEE Audio Nov. 23rd 2015. I received product in Dec. 2nd 2015. I was only able to use it after I purchased a blue tooth transmitter Feb. 22nd, 2016. The headphones connected great and worked for 2 weeks. After two weeks they would not pair or would shut off after 5 minutes when used as plug in headphones. I am having trouble contacting the supplier with only their website as a source of help. I like the product but it only lasted 2 weeks right now I feel like I wasted my money. After emailing MEE Audio and shipping back product. I received replacement which seems to work well. so far
customer_reviews.author: seedman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these each in different colors for my children. At first glance they seemed somewhat flimsy, but they have held up well for a year now with daily use. The sound is decent for the price, but I wouldnt expect the same quality sound as you might get from high end wired cans, so audiophiles be advised. But for what they are intended for and at this price point, they are very worth it. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Justin

customer_reviews.title: Another of my flop earphone buy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stay in ears so completely useless for running, not sure on what analysis they call these as Sports headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Vivek

customer_reviews.title: Work great.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were exactly what I wanted. They have great sound and easily paired with both my Blackberry and my ASUS T100T Transformer Book. I was quite surprised how easy they are to use and they require no setup beyond the initial pairing. With my Blackberry I am able to listen to music and place and/or receive calls simultaneously. When I press the button to connect the call, the headphones pause the music and put the call through. When I am finished with the call the headphones automatically restart the music where it left off. With my ASUS T100T, which is running Windows 8.1, the headphones perform flawlessly. On both devices all the buttons on the headphones function as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: These work pretty well & sound good enough for gym use
customer_reviews.text: These work pretty well & sound good enough for gym use. They stay in and are comfortable. After a few months the Bluetooth​ connection randomly drops a few times a week, but not anything unbearable
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Simply Awesome!  Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.text: After my first pair of bluetooth headphones by another manufacturer proved disappointing, these were a breath of fresh air. I LOVE these headphones. The sound quality is great, they connect effortlessly, and they are soooooo comfortable, even with my glasses. They are light on my head, and they are grippy enough not to fall around even while I work with them all day every day in my cleaning business. I'd gladly buy these again if I ever need to. My wife tried them and loved them too.
customer_reviews.author: whoyouthink

customer_reviews.title: Happy to own these
customer_reviews.text: Quite good at connecting to my mac book and iPhone 6. Love that this a quirky off brand I never heard of with a lame name and logo, but they are quite nice. My ears get a bit hot after extended use since they don't use the cup method. The blue light on the side is a bit obnoxious for the guy next to you on the plane, but no issue otherwise. The best part is the bluetooth switching. As for sound quality, no clue. Also the verbal announcement of the battery level is nice design.
customer_reviews.author: B. Blair

customer_reviews.title: Packs a punch!
customer_reviews.text: After trying out practically every form of bluetooth ear buds, I gave up because of fit or quality, or all of the above. I looked for over the ear headphones that were lightweight, comfortable, had great sound quality, and were priced right. These headphones have it all. Booming bass, great sound quality, and terrific comfort. I based my purchase on all the positive reviews of this product, and they were absolutely correct. These headphones are just flat awesome.
customer_reviews.author: rightmuch

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically nice, great sound, price is okay.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice set of headphones. The look and feel is nice, the sound is great as well as the microphone for phone calls. The people on the other end say it's loud, crisp and clear. The music is also crisp and clear, but the bass could be deeper . . . still a great sound for 60 bucks. The phone calls are crisp and clear and you can control the volume to better accommodate you and you hear the conversation on both ears. I love it and recommend it. I wish they were 40 and not 60 though...
customer_reviews.author: Top Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Why I bought a second one is the headphones are great to listen to and easy to answer a incoming ...
customer_reviews.text: 2nd purchase. 1 st set a little big after several months but ok if I wear a baseball cap. The charging cord became tricky after several months. Why I bought a second one is the headphones are great to listen to and easy to answer a incoming call and maneuver iTunes or my nokia 635 cellphone music. I listen to audiobooks and these headphones are comfortable for multiple hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: B a Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cheaper pair of bluetooth headphones and I saw the reviews for these headphones so I bit. I received the headphones and had them paired up in no time. The sound quality is pretty decent, but by no means studio quality. Battery life has given me about 10 hours but I usually recharge before they die. They are not massive which I appreciate since other companies like to make big cans to advertise their image. Would recommend these headphones for anyone looking for a solid pair of every day headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Georgeous

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this!
customer_reviews.text: Over used phrase here, but definitely the most bang for the buck. I no longer have a home phone. A fine concept until I get into a long winded conversation, or a long wait like the IRS. This is the solution. The range is nothing short of spectacular. Battery life is excellent. Music playback from a phone is very good. No it is not Bose or Koss but this cost 40 bucks. Be careful, because Amazon is playing their color game with different prices. One selection is 20 dollars higher.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Laidig

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I was searching high and low for an affordable quality bluetooth wireless headphones for my husband. I checked them all and this one has all of the bells and whistles with out the heft price tag like the rest. He loves to watch movies and TV on his iPad. Not only are they perfect for that but they are paired to the phones and computer as well. The quick set up and charging are a breeze. Fold up nicely to for into a briefcase, purse or carry on. I was warned about the blue blinking power indication light that can be annoying to everyone but the wearer. This was easily remedied with a piece of black electrical tape.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy77

customer_reviews.title: recommend if
customer_reviews.text: decent set of headphones for the price (got them on-sale) pros: light weight decent sound, although i find it on the low side wireless and wired fordable, great for travel fairly robust construction, as much as you can expect from plastic parts cons: find them kind of slippery, but in my case most of the time it is a plus, i tend to keep one of earpieces slightly off anyway, so i can hear if one of my kids are awake recommend getting them if they are on-sale
customer_reviews.author: vacation11

customer_reviews.title: Love these headsets
customer_reviews.text: Love these headsets. This is my 3rd pair. 1st pair kind of faded away after almost 2 years of constant use. Faded in the sense of its battery life. 2nd Pair was working great, until someone broke it in 1/2 trying to fold it the wrong way. I have noticed that the firmware has changed since the first one I bought. Now it announces power on and off and pairing or out of range like their other bluetooth headset - around the ear.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones for the Prcie!
customer_reviews.text: Got these headphones after looking at the reviews on Amazon. I own mostly Senneheiser and Bose headphones but wanted a more affordable wireless speakers. Sounds like that bluetooth is the way to go. I've never heard of this band before so i did a quick search on the internet. It was reviewed on CNET as a great option. These sound better than I expected for 60 bucks. Sound is pretty solid. Good bass, clear sounds. Bluetooth was easy to match, good battery life. would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Peppermint Patty

customer_reviews.title: Two Times Failed
customer_reviews.text: My first pair would say they were connected but about it 50% of the time I would have to re-pair them. They after owning for 5 weeks the left earbud quit working. To be fair customer service was very responsive about sending a replacement. However, I don’t know if they are refurbished or if there is an ongoing quality issue because the “new” pair won’t pair at all. I wish I’d paid the little xtra and waited for the iPhone wireless earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good battery life questionable construction.
customer_reviews.text: Good battery life, fair to good sound, left side broke after two years (questionable construction) and both headphones coating/paint peeled, has a tendency to slip from head (not tight enough).
customer_reviews.author: Destouches

customer_reviews.title: Big letdown-Awful battery performance
customer_reviews.text: These units have a big problem with battery life, the first one I bought simply would not charge and I had to return it. The second unit is progressively decreasing its battery life to the point it’s now at less than 2h. Maybe it’s a bad batch but definitely will not purchase this brand again. Too bad because the rest of features are good but that’s a show stopper
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Carrión

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, bad battery
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is really good for bluetooth earbuds. Best sound quality I've heard from any earbuds I've owned (although not as good as my headphones). However, the battery life is terrible. I've only had them for a few months, and they barely last 30-45 minutes on a close to full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: AirFi Bluetooth Stereo Headphones with microphone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. Nice headphones, comfortable padding good sound. Collapses for compact storage or carry. I had trouble pairing it with the iPhone 4 (old version) but the trouble-shooting portion of the manual help me solve that problem quickly. The iPhone 4S paired faster and both reconnected very easily. The only disappointment was that you cannot use the headset/mic while it is charging. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Charles

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: 2 weeks in and works great! Finally made the switch from using the “dongle” attachment to Bluetooth. They stay on ears quite nice and the strap doesn’t slap your neck while running. So far so good and. Don’t expect superior sound quality. Basically same sound you get out of stock ear pods, but get the job done!
customer_reviews.author: travis cosgaya

customer_reviews.title: Great mid-range product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband at Christmas. After 2 months of use, he is incredibly happy with the product, and I enjoy how little sound escapes when he is listening to his music in bed. The sound quality of these are excellent, especially for the price, and I could not imagine spending more unless you need a studio monitor quality. In that case- bluetooth would likely not be your best choice. Do not spend more on a pricier product. These are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: R. Englert

customer_reviews.title: MEElectronics Air-Fi Bluetooth Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are the best probable headphones I have ever used. They pair easily with my laptop and iphone every time. I use these at work everyday and the battery still hasn't died on me. They are very comfortable and offer shockingly good sound quality for the money. They produce deep but not overpowering bass, with strong mids and clear highs. One of the best features of these headphones is that they can also be used pugged in if the battery did happen to die at some point. They are truly one of the best values in electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Tek Everything

customer_reviews.title: A bit tinny ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these for NYC subway rides, and they're fine. They're not isolating, though, and obviously don't have noise reduction, so I do need to turn them up and when I do the sound quality definitely suffers. But, this is the NYC subway we're talking about, and even though it's a lot safer now than when I was a kid, I'd still not want to wear a pricey set of wireless, noise-cancelling headphones on the subway. These will not replaceme my wired headphones anytime soon, but they're handy to have.
customer_reviews.author: Noel S.

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth headset!
customer_reviews.text: Good battery charge. Nice sound. Decent price. Works good with smartphone conversations. It can get a little warm during the hot and humid summers. I would wear slightly off the ears to allow for some ventilation. It's not the highest quality but its good enough. If I really wanted the best sound then I wouldn't use headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Thranm4790

customer_reviews.title: Works with most devices
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my bf so he could have universal headphones for the gym, car and PS3. So far the sound quality is awesome but the music control doesn't work on his MP3 player or Samsung phone.. Blue tooth wifi works for Skype half the time but the sound quality for on the phone and music when plugged in is great. The cord given was a bit short so bought a mini aux in addition to this. Arrived on time.. just not as compatible as we wanted. Fits his wide head well though.
customer_reviews.author: TCR

customer_reviews.title: These are great headphones if you can find a pair that works
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones if you can find a pair that works. The first pair I bought on eBay and the bluetooth didn't work, so I bought another pair from Amazon, and it seemed to work good, but then after a month it seemed like one of the speakers were blown. Then after a week or so it was fine, so I dunno what that was all about. Either way they are really comfortable, and never have an issue connecting.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Honcho

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, clear musical range, sound isolation, & well made, a true deal
customer_reviews.text: I use these headphones almost everyday. They deliver a well balanced full range of sound, sound isolation from the outside world and are very comfortable even when they are on for long periods. These are not great for athletics where you move a lot, they will slide around and off if you jump or bend over. Because the sound isolation from the outside is so good, you need to be careful wearing these where you need to hear things (like cars, and things that can hit you)...i am very picky about sound anf headphones and these have stood up well for over a year
customer_reviews.author: michael

product_meta.title: MEE audio Runaway 4.0 Bluetooth Stereo Wireless + Wired Headphones with Microphone (Black)
product_meta.description: Style:Over the Ear| Color:BlackThe Runaway is a revolution in headphones, utilizing bold colors, sleek design, and Bluetooth brilliance to break the monotony of the day to day and transform the music listening experience from ordinary to extraordinary. The exquisite sound quality and ultra-soft ear pads of the Runaway let you enjoy your media at its best while the wireless design, all-day battery life, and built-in microphone and controls help declutter your life. This is a product of MEE audio (formerly MEElectronics).
feature_bullets: Can be used both wired (stereo audio only) and wirelessly. Connectivity Technology: Wired/Wireless
Supports A2DP for wireless stereo music playback; has built-in microphone for headset use and conveniently located phone/music controls
Ultra-soft ear pads and adjustable headband for extended wearing comfort
Folds for convenient storage and comes with a travel bag
Folds conveniently into included travel bag for storage and transport; includes 1-year manufacturer’s warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars1,077 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
